member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the MethodNameCompleted event.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Exception,System.Boolean,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Any error that occurred during the asynchronous operation.
A value indicating whether the asynchronous operation was canceled.
The optional user-supplied state object passed to the method.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether an asynchronous operation has been canceled.
member.returns: true if the background operation has been canceled; otherwise false. The default is false.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error
member.summary: Gets a value indicating which error occurred during an asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An instance, if an error occurred during an asynchronous operation; otherwise null.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.RaiseExceptionIfNecessary
member.summary: Raises a user-supplied exception if an asynchronous operation failed.
member.exception: The property has been set by the asynchronous operation. The property holds a reference to .

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the asynchronous task.
member.returns: An object reference that uniquely identifies the asynchronous task; otherwise, null if no value has been set.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the MethodNameCompleted event of an asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The percentage of an asynchronous task that has been completed.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage
member.summary: Gets the asynchronous task progress percentage.
member.returns: A percentage value indicating the asynchronous task progress.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.UserState
member.returns: A unique indicating the user state.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event of the class. This class cannot be inherited.
